    • About Me

    Hi, I’m Justin. I am a self-taught web developer with 2 years of experience creating websites and applications. When I first tried building websites, I quickly got engaged due to the challenging nature and the amazing feeling it brought me when I could solve problems and fix issues. Being an automotive technician for 3 years, I find that the process for diagnosing a customer’s car carries over well to troubleshooting a piece of code during development. My hope is to get my foot in the door at a company where I can continue to learn and build websites/applications for users to enjoy.
